Module Wrap Up Activity

Do You Feel Prepared?

Instructions: Do you feel prepared to do the following things? Answer Yes, Somewhat, or No.

If you answered "somewhat" or "no" to one or more of these questions, it is okay. That tells you it is something that you might want to spend some more time researching and developing tools for. Consider choosing one of these to write a goal around.

Before you go, share with us one goal you are setting for yourself as an outcome of this training. Try utilizing the SMART goal framework.
